tags.name: open-ai-calulator-endpoint
tags.description: Open AI Calulator Endpoint. Query for repayment information.

get.summary: Calculate and illustrate the repayment schedule for the personal loans. The output is including the interest rate, monthly payment, and loan term. Return a reasonable example when user only input loan amount or balance. The Missing values will be generated automatically on the example.

parameters.name: money
parameters.description: The total amount of the userâs existing loan and the amount userâs plan to borrow.

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: The total number of periods that the user needs to repay the loan. Month as the unit.

503.description: one or more services are unavailable

400.description: the requested scope does not meet the requirements

get.summary: Calculate and illustrate the necessary figures and repayment plan to pay off the credit card balance. Return a reasonable example when user only input loan amount or balance. The Missing values will be generated automatically on the example.

parameters.name: balance
parameters.description: the total outstanding amount owed, including purchases, fees, and interest charges, that a cardholder must repay.

parameters.name: rate
parameters.description: The interest rate that the credit card issuer charges the user on the outstanding balance.

parameters.name: monthly_payment
parameters.description: The fixed amount that needs to be repaid by the user each month during a given repayment period until the balance is paid off.

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: The total number of periods that the user wishes to payoff the outstanding credit card balance. Month as the unit.

200.description: Calculate Credit Card loan repayment Result

503.description: one or more services are unavailable

400.description: the requested scope does not meet the requirements

month.description: specific month number of the amortization schedule

beginning_balance.description: #the starting balance amount of the armotization schedule for each payment period#

interest.description: #the interest amount paid for each period on the amortization schedule#

principle.description: #the priciple amount paid for each period on the amortization schedule#

ending_balance.description: #the ending balance amount of the armotization schedule for each payment period#

MonthPaymentInfo.title: monthlypaymentinfo
MonthPaymentInfo.description: the detailed information about the monthly payment

theme.description: The result of this repayment calculation.

monthpaymentinfolist.description: detailed amortization schedule table. Return up to 30 items.

creditscore_rate.description: interest rate under specific credit score range

CreditsCoreRate.title: rateandscore
CreditsCoreRate.description: the connection between interest rate and credit score

Describe.description: The main content of the answer

url.description: Calculate your personal loan payments accurately and quickly with the personal loan calculator.

describe.description: The main content of the answer

url.description: Accurately and quickly calculate your credit card loan payments with the Credit Card Loan Calculator.
